text: The 1978–80 Nordic Football Championship was the 12th Nordic Football Championship. Four Nordic countries were in the tournament, Denmark, Finland, Norway and Sweden. Denmark ended up winning their 2nd title. == Results == Lars Aarhus; Søren Elbech; Heikki Pietarinen, 'Nordic Championships 1978-80', Rec.Sport.Soccer Statistics Foundation (27 Mar 1998) Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts Denmark 6 5 1 0 9 3 +6 11 Sweden 6 3 0 3 7 6 +1 6 Norway 6 2 1 3 11 9 +2 5 Finland 6 0 2 4 3 12 –9 2 == References == Category:Nordic Football Championship Category:1980 in European football Category:1970s in Norway Category:1970s in Denmark Category:1970s in Finland Category:1980s in Finland Category:1970s in Sweden Category:1980s in Sweden Category:1980s in Norway Category:1978 in association football Category:1979 in association football Category:1978 in Europe Category:1979 in Europe
title: 1978–80 Nordic Football Championship
